en.title: FusionExcel Welcomes VIP Quantum Pendant Wearer, H.E. Ambassador of Laos Dr Bountheuang Mounlasy!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to welcome His Excellency Ambassador of Laos, Dr Bountheuang Mounlasy and his wife who attended FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at MAEPS, Serdang on 12th September 2009. At the event Dr Bountheuang witnessed the signing of FE's Laos Country Licensee ( held by Patrick Anthony ) and gave a speech on social entrepreneurship which is in line with FE's vision and how it can help eradicate poverty in under developed countries. FE looks forward to the expansion of FE's business in Laos.

meta.description: Dr Bountheuang Mounlasy and his wife who attended FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at MAEPS.
meta.keyword: Hope For Children, Wearer, Loas Mounlasy, MAEPS
meta.author: klhunter
